title: Calculus
quote: Dive into the world of limits, derivatives, and integrals!

questions.question: 01. What is the derivative of x²?
02. What is the integral of 1/x dx?
03. What is the derivative of sin(x)?
04. What is the second derivative of x³?
05. What is the limit of (sin(x)/x) as x approaches 0?
